SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

picard.cmdline
Annotation Type CommandLineProgramProperties

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface CommandLineProgramProperties

Annotates a command line program with various properties, such as usage (short and long), as well as to which program group it belongs. TODO: enforced that any CommandLineProgram has this property defined (use an annotation processor?).

Required Element Summary
 java.lang.String usage
           
 java.lang.String usageShort
           
 
Optional Element Summary
 boolean omitFromCommandLine
           
 java.lang.Class<? extends CommandLineProgramGroup> programGroup
           
 

Element Detail

usage

public abstract java.lang.String usage

usageShort

public abstract java.lang.String usageShort

programGroup

public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends CommandLineProgramGroup> programGroup
Default:
picard.cmdline.programgroups.None.class

omitFromCommandLine

public abstract boolean omitFromCommandLine
Default:
false
